org.zaproxy.zap.session

Class SessionManagementMethodType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.session.SessionManagementMethodType
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the corresponding session management method
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CookieBasedSessionManagementMethodType, HttpAuthSessionManagementMethodType

    public abstract class SessionManagementMethodType
extends Object
    A type of session management method. This class also acts as a factory for creating SessionManagementMethod objects.

    The implementors of new Session Management Methods should also implement a corresponding type. The system automatically detects and loads SessionManagementMethodType classes and, through them, the corresponding session management methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Thrown when an unsupported type of SessionManagement is used.

      • createSessionManagementMethod

        public abstract SessionManagementMethod createSessionManagementMethod(int contextId)
        Builds a new, empty, session management method. The session mangement method should then be configured through its corresponding Options panel.
        Parameters:
        contextId - the context id
        Returns:
        the session management method
        See Also:
        SessionManagementMethodType#buildOptionsPanel(SessionManagementMethod, int)

      • getUniqueIdentifier

        public abstract int getUniqueIdentifier()
        Gets the unique identifier of this Session Management Method Type. It has to be unique among all Session Management Method Types.
        Returns:
        the unique identifier

      • buildOptionsPanel

        public abstract AbstractSessionManagementMethodOptionsPanel buildOptionsPanel(Context uiSharedContext)
        Builds the options panel that can be used to fully configure a session management method.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the abstract session method options panel
        See Also:

      • hasOptionsPanel

        public abstract boolean hasOptionsPanel()
        Checks if the corresponding SessionManagementMethod has an options panel that can be used for configuration.
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        See Also:

      • hook

        public abstract void hook(ExtensionHook extensionHook)
        Hooks the Session Management Method Type with other components of ZAP, if needed. This method will be called only once, when authentication types are loaded.

        For example, PopupMenus can be registered.

        Parameters:
        extensionHook - the extension hook

      • loadMethodFromSession

        public abstract SessionManagementMethod loadMethodFromSession(Session session,
                                            int contextId)
                                                       throws DatabaseException
        Loads a session management method from the Session. The implementation depends on the a session management method type.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the session management method
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • persistMethodToSession

        public abstract void persistMethodToSession(Session session,

                                            DatabaseException
        Persists the session management method to the session.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        contextId - the context id
        method - the session management method to persist
        Throws:
        SessionManagementMethodType.UnsupportedSessionManagementMethodException - the unsupported session management method exception
        DatabaseException - the sQL exception

      • getSetMethodForContextApiAction

        public abstract ApiDynamicActionImplementor getSetMethodForContextApiAction()
        Gets the ApiDynamicActionImplementor that can be used to set a session management method of this type for a context.

        This api action will be handled by executing the ApiDynamicActionImplementor.handleAction(JSONObject) method.

        Returns:
        the api action, or null if there is no way to set this method type through the API
